headline: PSEG recommends shareholders reject "mini-tender" offer by TRC Capital Investment Corporation
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group (NYSE: PEG) today announced that it has received notice of an unsolicited mini-tender offer by TRC Capital Investment Corporation of Ontario, Canada, to purchase up to 1.5 million shares of PSEG common stock at a price of $80.60 per share. TRC Capital Investment's offer price of $80.60 per share is approximately 4.51% lower than the $84.41 closing share price of PSEG's common stock on July 21, 2025, the last trading day prior to the date of the offer, and approxim
